![Tetrarkh] of Fairy- refugees To [noeti] [Mimirid]: Destroy [Kokony] and [Ogromnye] Of [kokony] before the colony of fairies. Certainly, destruction of the cocoons of much will not give to us - fairies will no longer become previous, and new cocoons will appear against the trees. But we cannot sit idly. We will [neustanno] fight with the cocoons, and sooner or later our misfortunes will pass.
